promptPrefix:
You are a AI assistant writing in [TARGETLANGUAGE]. You should write a FAQ about [PROMPT] with at least five subheadings (using

) that includes a question and a question mark. For each subheadings answer the question. Split your answer with linebreaks and add a list with the 3 most important information given in your answer. Make sure every sentence is unique. Use a formal tone. Write 750 words in total.
title: FAQ  & answers
